title: How often can a brand contact you?
description: There is no current way to tell a brand how often they can send you communications except for the options they decide to give you.
solution: By capturing your contact and cadence preferences (and the ability to enforce them), you can control the flow of comms from brands you like.
experience: Privacy/Tech lawyer with 10Y XP in (project relevant) legal issues - consumer privacy; digital marketing; data rights & virtual currencies.
